comment_0: The song is pretty self explanatory. He thought he would be with this girl forever but things didn't go as planned. Even though he loves her, he knows that staying with her will only hurt her more. He has to leave her in order to find what it is he's looking for. I think this song captures that feeling of not wanting to leave a person, but knowing that you have to, and the emotions that come with not knowing how to do it.

This song is just one of those "I'll-never-get-sick-or-tired-of-this".. It's a sad song .. pretty self explanatory like someone said. It's a simple plot when you still LOVE the person, just not IN love with them.. you still care for them immensely but it's just not working out. You don't to hurt them of course but you know it's the right thing to do because one person has changed and grown in a different direction. 

That's why I think it's so hard to stay in love, I look at people who are like 70 and still deeply in "love" and think how the hell do they do it. I guess it's different with age but it's still a scary thought.. committing your WHOLE life to just one person.. for the rest of your life, everyday you wake up and it's gonna be them next to you. Scary!

I guess I'm drifting off. But it's sad to "Say Goodbye" as the song says but it has to be done because it's so hard to find someone that's constantly growing with you & then you turn back and realise you're both not the same people you were when you fell in love.
